name: Color Switch Replica (JojuGeorge)
description:
Color Switch Replica

CONTROLS : 

  • Use left mouse button or space bar.
  • Press Esc key to go to pause menu or click on the pause button.

TOOLS USED :

  • Unity 2019.1
  • Adobe Photoshop CC

Go to my Github page to download the whole project link -> Github Project

Go to Builds folder to download PC or Android or Web version of the game.

Go to Gameplay folder to see the game play of the game

Vist this link to download the gameplay -> Gameplay

ADDED :

  • Menu
  • Points for collecting color changing balls
  • Pause menu
  • Level complete menu
  • Background music
  • 2 Levels

Game made based on studying from Brackeys tutorial link -> Brackeys tutorial

Feel free to comment on how to improve the game : )
